Name: The Werewolf Hills
About the game: Go in this FPS adventure protecting yourself against the dangers with different weapons like guns, crossbows, explosives, etc. You will need to look for ammo, items and other useful stuff in dangerous places for survive and as you go, you will be discover the mysteries of that hill. Synopsis You are lost, driving on a hill and your car is being out of fuel and you dont know what to do. Your only option will be search for help, but something bad are happening in the nearest town. As you go, you will notice that the hills are invaded of dangerous sectarians and also a fierce monster, so get help wont be so easy, you will need to search for weapons and kill them if you dont want to die. Finally the night comes and you hear a fierce howl..
